item.title: XY Utilities v1.0.4.5
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.0.4.5
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 18 Mar 2020 13:13:03 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- Arithmetic: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide
- Array: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Subset, Sway X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Waveform to XY
- DSP: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum

Release Notes: [1.0.4.5]
New method:
- XY to Waveform.vi
Bug Fixes
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.10.17
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.10.17
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 13 Mar 2020 07:23:25 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.9.10.17]
Decimation improvements:
- order is now: filter then decimate with averaging
- AO and REF waveforms are also filtered and decimated (after being sent to the oscillator)
Remove 'are you sure?' dialog when exiting
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
